Norma is a member of the Communal Bank “Velasco Astete” which is located in the District of Cusco in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco.

She continues her business of selling roasted pigs and tamales for different events that are in need of her services. Norma has been in this business for years and is doing well thanks to the effort she puts forth each day into her work. She wants to keep working at her business so that she can continue to support her family.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy lard, meat, oil, and other supplies. Norma appreciates the loan that has been issued and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy lard, meat, oil, and other supplies.

loans.name: Hasanjon

texts.ru: Хасанчону 19 лет. После окончания средней школы он поступил в технический лицей и окончил успешно. В этом году он поступил в университет, чтобы получить высшее образование. Хасанчон живет с мамой и сестрой. Его мама работает поваром в больнице. Она не имеет достаточно денег, чтобы оплатить за учебный договор Хасанчона. Поэтому Хасанчон обратился в ИМОН за займом в сумму 800 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Hasanjon is 19 years old. After finishing high school, he   enrolled into a technical college and  graduated from it successfully. This year he entered the university in order to receive higher education. Hasanjon lives with his mother and sister. His mother works as a cook in a hospital. She lacks the funds necessary to pay Hasanjon's tuition. This is why Hasanjon has applied to IMON for a loan in the amount of 800 USD to pay his tuition. He is counting on your kindness and hoping for your compassion.

loans.use: to pay for tuition.

loans.name: Nim's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer in Kampong Cham province, Nim is 35 years old and a mother of three children. She struggles for a living via rice cropping on a two-hectare area. To earn more income, she works for others for a fee. 

For Nim, this is her second loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loan completely. She leads a group of two to get a new loan. As a group leader, she will take this loan portion to buy fertilizer and pay the plowing fee to support her farmland. She hopes that she can earn more income and expand her main business bigger than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pay the plowing fee to support her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Ang's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area in Kampong Cham province, Ang is 39 years old and a mother of two children. She earns income to improve her family condition via rice cropping. She has been involved this business for 21 years and it earns her about 33,300 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

This is her third loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loan successfully. She leads a group of three members to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and pay the plowing fee to support her rice farm. She strongly hopes that she can earn more income to improve her family's condition, better than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pay the plowing fee to support her rice farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Elsa Blanca

texts.es:
Elsa Blanca tiene 43 años de edad, es casada, vive con su hija de 4 años, su esposo trabaja en el extranjero (España), vive en casa propia, en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Saña y goza con buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. Dicho distrito está ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Elsa Blanca se dedica a la actividad de venta de abarrotes, pollo, carnes, verduras y frutas, con más de 3 años de antigüedad en el negocio, en su propio domicilio. Ella solicita préstamo para la compra de mercadería como arroz, azúcar, aceites y otros, para poder surtir su negocio y poder aumentar su stock, de esta forma poder atender a todos los gustos y preferencias de su público consumidor. De esta manera hacer crecer más su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elsa Blanca is 43 years old, married, and lives with her four-year-old daughter. Her husband works abroad (in Spain). She lives in her own home in a large community within the urban district of Saña. Elsa has good personal and work references from her neighbors. Her community is basically known for agriculture, livestock breeding, and trade. This district is located in Chiclayo Province, which is in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Elsa Blanca has a business where she sells groceries, chicken, meats, vegetables, and fruit. She has more than three years of experience in this business, which she operates from her home. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, oil, and other products so that she can restock her business and increase her inventory. This will enable her to satisfy all of the needs and preferences of her customers. Working in this manner will grow her business even more, allow her to generate more income, and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, and other products.

loans.name: Than's Group

texts.en:
Than, 39, lives in Pursat province and is a mother of three children. She struggles for a living via rice cropping, and it earns her about 28,800 KHR per day to support her family condition. 

This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). In a group of three members, she is a group leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, pesticide and seeds to support her rice farm. She hopes that she can improve her family's conditions better than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, pesticide and seeds to support her rice farm.

loans.name: Pen's Group

texts.en:
A villager in Pursat province, Pen is 30 years old and a mother of two schoolchildren. For her living, she grows rice on a 2-hectare area as her main source of income. She has been involved in it for 12 years and earns about 19,700 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

Pen leads a group of three to get a new loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loans completely. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer to support her farmland. She hopes that she can expand her farmland to get more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to support her farmland.

loans.name: Koemhak's Group

texts.en:
Koemhak, 35, lives in Pursat province and is a mother of four children. To tackle her family’s hardship, she grows rice as a single source of income and catches fish for selling to supplement her income. She has been occupied in this business for ages and it earns her about 39,700 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). In a group of two members, she is a group leader. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and pesticide to support her farmland. She hopes that she can get a good yield to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide to support her farmland.

loans.name: Nemisis Arely

texts.es: Nemisis tiene 30 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus padres, hermanos y dos sobrinos. Ella trabaja como operaria en una industria cercana a su localidad desde hace mucho tiempo. Nemisis desea mejorar las condiciones del piso de la vivienda por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso de la vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Nemisis is 30 years old and resides in her own home along with her parents, siblings, and two nephews. She has been working as an operator at a factory near her town for quite some time.

Nemisis wants to improve the condition of the floor in her home, so she decided to request this loan from FUSAI. She will invest in the purchase of sand, cement, and gravel so that she can lay down a concrete floor as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy materials for laying down a concrete floor in her home.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia Isabel continua dedicándose  a la venta de muebles de madera la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dúa a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando con su negocio para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de camas entre otros.
La socia Isabel pertenece al banco comunal “Velasco Astete” .
texts.en:
Isabel continues to manage her business of selling wood furniture. She has been in this business for years and is doing well thanks to the effort she puts forth each day into her work. Isabel wants to keep working at her business so that she can continue to support her family.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy beds and other products. Isabel is a member of the Communal Bank “Velasco Astete”.

loans.use: to buy beds and other products.

loans.name: Yanira Del Transito

texts.es:
Yanira,  manifiesta que ha tenido una experiencia positiva con la inversión de créditos en su negocio, se ha decidido por un nuevo financiamiento para comprar bebidas, golosinas, pan, huevos, especias, jabón, etc., para surtir la tienda y cubrir las demandas de sus clientes.
Con el crédito anterior ha mantenido su negocio en el mercado, recupero lo invertido con un buen margen de ganancias y el grupo familiar se mantiene.
texts.en:
Yanira says that she has had a positive experience from investing loans into her business. She decided to request a new loan in order to buy beverages, snack foods, bread, eggs, spices, soap, and other products so that she can restock her store and meet the demands of her customers.

With her previous loan, she was able to maintain her business at the market, recoup what she invested as a result of a good profit margin, and sustain her family.

loans.use: to buy beverages, snack foods, bread, eggs, spices, soap, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Koeurn's Group

texts.en: Koeurn, 26, is a farmer living in the Battambang province.  She is a mother of two young children. She earns an income through rice cropping on a one hectare area, and planting cassava to earn extra income. She earns about 40,300 KHR per day. This is her second cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid back her past loan wisely at a gradual pace to improve her living conditions. As a leader of a group of two, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and pesticide. She hopes that she can get a good yield so she can update her lifestyle so that it is better than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticide.

loans.name: Srors' Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from Kampong Cham province, Srors is 31 years old. She is a mother of five children, two of whom are in school and one is too young. She earns a living through growing cucumbers and cabbage. Moreover, she earns extra income via fish-catching for her family.

This is her first loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of four members to get a new loan. As a leader of the group, she will spend her loan portion to buy seed and fertilizer to support her farmland. She hopes that she can get a good yield so she can sell it for a high price.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer to support her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: Chhin

texts.en:
An old woman from Kampong Cham province, Chhin is 62 years old and a mother of nine children. To earn a living, she grows rice on a two-hectare area as her main source of income. Moreover, she earns extra income via fish-catching. 

This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She will spend her loan to buy fertilizer and seed to support her rice farm. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than last year.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seed to support her rice farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Khong's Group

texts.en: Khong is a 22-year-old single man living in Battambang province.  To make a living he grows rice, which is his main source of income. He also earns income from sewing. He leads a group of two members who want to request a loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). As the leader, he will spend his loan portion to buy fertilizer and pay for labor fees. He hopes that he can improve his living condition to a state that is better than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pay for labor fees.

loans.name: Roth's Group

texts.en:
A resident in Kampong Cham province, Roth is 38 years old and she has three children. For making a living, she earns income via rice cropping on a 1-hectare area and is working as a construction worker to supplement her income. 

This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). In a group of four members, she is a leader. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed to support her rice farm. She hopes that she can earn more income to improve her rice farm.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed to support her rice farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Khoeun's Group

texts.en:
Khoeun, a mother of two dependent children, lives in Pusat province. To struggle for her living, she earns income via making wine for sale and raising pigs.

This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). In a group of four, she is a group leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy more pigs and rice. She hopes that she can she upgrade her business better than before.

loans.use: To buy more pigs and rice.

loans.name: Sanhon's Group

texts.en:
Sanhon, 60, is an old woman who is from Kampong Cham province. For the sake of her family, she grows rice on a 1-hectare area and works as construction worker to earn extra income. 

For Sanhon, this is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her loan to buy fertilizer and seed. She hopes that she can earn more income to expand her rice farm.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seed.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Sroy's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer living in Kampong Cham province, Sroy is 33 years old. She is a mother of three children, two of whom are in school and one is too young. For her family, she grows rice, and her husband works as a construction worker to earn more income to support her family's condition. She can earn about 33,300 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of five members to get a new loan. As the leader of the group, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy rice seed to support her rice farm. She hopes that she can gain a good yield so she can sell at a high price.

loans.use: to buy rice seed to support her rice farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: I's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer living in Kampong Cham province, I is 49 years old. She is a mother of seven children, two of whom are in school. She struggles for a living via rice cropping on a 1-hectare area. Moreover, she works as a construction worker to earn more income to support her family’s needs. She has been involved in this business for ages and earns about 41,700 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

For I, this is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She will spend her loan portion to buy seeds to support her farmland, and she hopes that she can get a good yield, more than last year.

loans.use: To buy seed to support her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Nen's Group

texts.en: Nen is 35 years old and is a local resident living in Kompong Cham province.  She is a mother of six children. To tackle her family’s hardship, she grows cassava and rice as her main source of income. This is her second cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loan. She is the leader in a group of two members. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer, seed and pay for labor fees. She hopes that she can get more yield so she can sell the goods at a high price.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seed and pay for labor fees.

loans.name: Pach's Group

texts.en: Pach, 34, is a mother of two schoolchildren living in Kampong Cham province. To support her family, she earns an income by growing cassava and from rice cropping. Moreover, her husband works for others for a fee to earn more income. For Phach, this is her fifth cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans. She leads a group of two to request a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and pay for labor fees. She really hopes that she can get a good yield and she can sell at a good price.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pay for labor fees.

loans.name: Moeun's Group

texts.en: Moeun is a resident in the Prey Veng province and is a mother of three children. For her family, rice farming is the only source of income.  She has been in this business for several years. Moreover, her husband earns extra income from a horse cart. This her first loan with Moeun with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is a leader group of two and she will spend her loan portion to buy rice seed and fertilizer. She hopes that she can improve her business to be better than before.

loans.use: To buy rice seed and fertilizer.

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Long's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area in Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Long, 32, is a mother of three dependent children; one is too young for schooling and two are in school. 

For supporting her living, she cultivates paddy rice on three hectares of farmland as the main source of income, and grows pineapples to supplement her income. 

This is her third loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loans completely. In a group of two, she is the leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy rice seeds and fertilizer to support her farmland. She hopes that she can improve her family's lives and health.

loans.use: To buy rice seeds and fertilizer to support her farmland.

loans.name: Oeur

texts.en:
Oeur, 46, is a villager in Kompong Cham province. She is a mother of six children, two of whom are in school. To struggle for a living, she grows cassava, and her husband works as a construction worker. 

For Oeur, this is her fourth loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loans completely. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and seed. She hopes that she can get a good yield.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seed.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Oem's Group

texts.en:
Residing in Pursat province, Oem is 45 years old and a mother of eight children. 

To improve her family's conditions, she grows rice on a five hectare area and catches fish as her main sources of income. Moreover, her husband also grows rice on a three hectare area and catches fish, the same as her, to supplement their income. She has been involved in her current business for ages and earns her about 34,200 KHR per day. 

This is the third cycle for Oem with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans completely. She leads a group of four to get a new loan. As a group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer, seeds and pesticide for her farmland. She hopes that she can get a good yield.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds and pesticide for her farmland.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy metal sheeting for the roof of his house because the rain is damaging the walls and wood which is not covered.

loans.name: Maria Gloria

texts.es:
María, continua mejorando la ganadería, la inversión del préstamo anterior le ayudo a mantener sus animales en óptimas condiciones, actualmente el ganado ha aumentado,  sus ingresos son más estables, la productividad de lácteos es mayor de esta manera asegura una buena alimentación para su familia y cubre demandas de sus clientes.
Solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar concentrado, para  alimentar mejor las vacas que están paridas, realiza esta inversión con el propósito de mantener su ganado saludable y un negocio más ranteble.
texts.en:
María continues improving her cattle farm.  She used the previous loan to keep her animals in top condition.  Now she has more cattle and her income is more stable.  Dairy production has increased and this allows her to feed her family and meet customer demands.

Maria is requesting a loan to buy animal feed so she can feed the cows that have recently given birth.  Her aim is to keep her cattle healthy and her business profitable.

loans.use: To buy animal feed for her cows.

loans.name: Djekafo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe DJEKAFO est composé de femmes mariées, elles ont en moyenne 40 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans la ville de Dioïla, préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font la restauration, le commerce de l’habillement, d’ustensile de cuisine et d’articles divers.
Les femmes du groupe DJEKAFO sont à leur quatrième prêt solidaire.
Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à Soro Yiriwaso.
La cliente SANATA, première personne de la gauche vers la droite dans le rang des debout est analphabète, elle est actuellement vendeuse d’articles divers. Elle compte acheter 1 sac de mil, du sucre, des paquets de lait en poudre et du sachet plastique sur place chez les grossistes. 
La vente se fait en détail et en espèce chez elle à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 30 000Fcfa, qui sera réinvesti dans son activité.
texts.en:
The Djekafo group is made up of married women who, on average, are 40 years old and have three children. They all live in traditional families in the town of Dioïla, in Dioïla prefecture, Koulikoro region (the second administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They know each other from family, neighborhood, and friendship ties. And they work preparing food and selling clothing, kitchen utensils and a variety of other goods. 

In order to meet the enormous demand from their customers, these women decided to join Soro Yiriwaso. They are now on their fourth loan.

Sanata, the person standing first on the left [in the photo], is illiterate. She works selling a variety of goods. [With her loan], she plans to buy one sac of millet, some sugar, powdered milk, and plastic bags from wholesalers. Sales will be made at retail for cash from her home to a mixed group of customers. 

Sanata hopes to earn an average profit of 30,000 francs CFA, which she will reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy various goods

loans.name: Dilshoda

texts.ru: Дилшода родилась в 1996 году. Она добрая и трудолюбивая девушка. Дилшода всегда мечтала поступить в университет и получить высшее образование. В этом году она окончила среднюю школу и поступила в университет. Она теперь студентка 1 курса Таджикского Государственного Университета Политики и Бизнеса по специальности Мировая экономика. Она активно участвует в общественной жизни университета и учится активно. Дилшода запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Dilshoda was born in 1996 and she is a kind and hardworking young woman.  She long dreamed of entering the university and earning a higher education.  She finished secondary school this year and was accepted to the university.  She is now a first year student at the Tajik State University of Politics and Business, where she is studying international economics.   Dilshoda studies hard and is an active participant in her school's social functions.

Dilshoda is requesting this loan to pay her tuition.  She is relying on your compassion and kindness.

loans.use: to pay her tuition

loans.name: Indira

texts.ru: Индира, 39 лет, не замужем, имеет 2 детей. Образование - высшее. Около 20 лет назад начала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря непосильному труду Индиры и ее емкой работе, она достигла хороших успехов в развитии хозяйства и стала получать ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 6,500 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Индиры имеется: 10 овец, 1 корова и 1 бычок. Также есть земельный надел мерою 1,80 ГА, где она выращивает эспарцет. Полученной прибыли не хватает на достойную жизнь. Также этот год был засушливый и неурожайный и не удалось заготовить корм для скота . В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Индира обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 100 тюков сена для скота. Доходы от кредита Индира планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота в своем хозяйстве.
texts.en:
Indira is 39 years old, unmarried, and has two children.   She also has a higher education.  About 20 years ago she started a business in farming and animal husbandry.  As a result of her backbreaking labor and intense work, she has had good success in developing her business, with her monthly  income now coming to 6,500 som (KGS).  Currently, Indira has 10 sheep, a cow, and a bull calf.   She also has a 1.8 ha plot of land where she grows sainfoin.  However, her income isn't enough to provide her with a decent standard of living.

This year there was a drought and Indira had a very bad harvest.  She was not able to harvest enough feed for her cattle.  With an aim to developing her business further, Indira applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to buy 100 bales of hay for her cattle.  She intends to invest the profits from her loan in continuing to increase the size of her herd.

loans.use: to purchase 100 bales of hay as a feed for livestock

loans.name: Lola

texts.ru: Лола является повторной клиенткой ИМОНа. Она очень честная молодая женщина и имеет хорошее кредитное досье. Прежние займы она использовала для развития бизнеса. Лола занимается купле продажей мебели. Она покупает старые мебели, отремонтирует и продает на местном рынке. Она работает упорно и трудится с раннего утра более чем 6 лет, чтобы зарабатывать деньги и обеспечить 2 детей. Ее муж повар и получает не большую зарплату. Лола планирует расширить свой бизнес. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки мебели, чтобы увеличить оборотный капитал. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Lola is a repeat client of IMON International.  She is a very honest young woman and has a good credit history.  She used her previous loans for developing her business.  Lola is in the furniture business.  She buys old furniture, fixes it up, and then sells it at the local market.  She works very hard and starts early in the morning.  She has been in this business for more than six years as a way to earn the money to provide for her two children.  He husband is a cook and earns a small salary.

Lola is planning to expand her business.  She is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni (TJS) to buy furniture which will increase her working capital.  She is relying on your compassion and kindness.

loans.use: to buy furniture for increasing working capital

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María, ha mantenido la sastrería activa con ayuda del crédito anterior, cuenta con más clientes satisfechos, su calidad de vida ha cambiado positivamente y conserva su buena calificación crediticia.
Está optando por un nuevo préstamo para comprar telas, hilos, agujas, encajes, botones, etc., tendrá materiales para elaborar las diferentes prendas de vestir y cumplirá con los encargos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Maria has continued her tailoring business with the help of her previous loan. She now has more satisfied customs, her quality of life has improved and she has maintained her good credit rating. 

She is opting for a new loan to buy materials like: fabric, thread, needles, lace, buttons, etc to make different pieces of clothing and satisfy her customers' demands.

loans.use: to buy materials like: fabric, thread, needles, lace, buttons, etc to make different pieces of clothing.

loans.name: Aichurok

texts.ru: Айчурок 43 года, вдова, мать троих детей. Образование средне-специальное, на протяжении 20 лет Айчурок работает завхозом. Также на протяжении многих лет занимается сельским хозяйством. Благодаря упорному труду Айчурок, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 4 коровы и 20 овец. Прибыль от ведения бизнеса составляет 3,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Этих средств и даже заработной платы катастрофически не хватает на достойную жизнь и содержание троих детей школьного возраста. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айчурок обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 телят. Айчурок планирует доходы от кредита вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, чтобы накопить средства на высшее образование ее детей.
texts.en:
Aichurok is 43 years old, a widow, and the mother of three children.  She has a specialized secondary level education and for 20 years she has worked as an administrative manager.   For many years, she has also been in the cattle business.  As a result of her hard work, today Aichurok has four cows and 20 sheep.  The monthly profit from her business comes to 3,000 som (KGS).  Even counting her salary, her income is far from enough to ensure a decent standard of living and provide for her school-aged children.

With the goal of developing her business further, Aichurok applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy four calves.  She plans to invest the profits from the loan in continuing to develop her business so she can save up money for her children's higher educations.

loans.use: to purchase four calves to help bolster her income

loans.name: Viktoriya

texts.ru: Виктория добрая и целеустремленная женщина. Ей 30 лет. Она разведена и не имеет детей. Виктория после развода вернулась в дом родителей и начала свой бизнес. Она занимается купле продажей продуктов питания. Виктория владеет продуктовым магазином. Ее магазин находится на местном рынке. Она этим бизнесом занимается уже более 3 лет. Виктория обратилась за займом в сумме 3000 сомони для покупки продуктов питания, чтобы расширить ассортимент товара. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Viktoriya is a kind and goal-oriented woman.  She is 30 years old, divorced, and has no children.  After her divorce, Viktoriya moved back in with her parents and started her own grocery business.  She has been in this business for three years and owns her own store at the local market.  

Viktoriya has applied for a loan of 3,000 somoni (TJS) to buy grocery items so as to expand her assortment of goods.  She is relying on your kindness and charity.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to increase her variety of goods

loans.name: Manzura

texts.ru: Манзура заботливая мать 2 детей. Ее дети Насиба и Бибиханифа несовершеннолетние. Манзура работает поваром в средней школе. Она готовит разнообразные блюда для учеников. Она получает небольшую зарплату, которая ели хватает для проживания. Манзура данное время нуждается финансовой поддержке. Она серьёзно больна и ей необходимо срочно лечится. Манзура запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки лекарства. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Manzura is the loving mother of two young children, Nasiba and Bibikhanifa.  Manzura is a cook in a middle school, preparing various dishes for the students.  She earns a small salary that is barely enough for her basic needs.   

Presently, Manzura needs financial support.  She is seriously ill and she urgently needs to get treatment.  She is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni (TJS) to buy medicine.  She is relying on your charity and kindness.

loans.use: to buy medicine

loans.name: El Huarango Group

texts.es: Elena es una mujer de 55 años de edad y pertenece al grupo EL HUARANGO,  tiene  cinco hijos  cuenta con el apoyo de su familia y actualmente solo es el sustento de su última hija aun menor de edad  de 17 años y también apoya a su suegro. Se dedica al negocio del reciclaje desde hace 38 años y ahora también cuenta con un pequeño negocio de zapatillas, y por las noches se dedica a la venta de comida rápida, nos cuenta que le gusta su negocio porque está  ubicado en su propio hogar, por el tiempo que tiene trabajando ha logrado conseguir muchos clientes que le muestran satisfacción por sus ventas. Solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio de reciclaje como en la compra de equipos como balanzas para pesar, etc. Se siente muy entusiasmada por conseguir el préstamo y agradecida con los inversionistas de KIVA por el apoyo que la brindan y así poder   seguir mejorando su calidad de vida y seguir siendo emprendedora y empresaria.
texts.en:
Elena is a 55 year old woman and belongs to the "EL HUARANGO" group. She has five children and relies on the help of her family. Now, she only has to support her youngest daughter, who at 17 is still underage, and her father-in-law.  She has been making a living working in the recycling business for the past 38 years and now she also has a small shoe business and in the evenings she sells fast food. 

She tells us that she likes her business because she runs it from her own house and due to the amount of time she has been working, she has managed to build up a base of satisfied customers. 

She is requesting a loan to invest in her recycling business, to buy things like weighing scales, etc. She feels very enthusiastic about receiving the loan and thankful to the KIVA investors for the support they are offering, allowing her to continue improving her quality of life and keep being enterprising and entrepreneurial.

loans.use: to buy equipment for her recycling business.

loans.name: Muzafar

texts.ru: Музафар умный и начитанный молодой человек. Ему 21 года. Он является студентом 2 курса Национального Университета Таджикистана. Родители Музафара всегда мечтали, чтобы их сын поступил в университет и получил высшее образование. Поступив в университет, он на половину осуществил мечту своих родителей, и теперь он старается получить хорошие знания и успешно окончить университет и таким образом в полностью осуществить мечту родителей и свою мечту тоже. Он обратился в ИМОН, чтобы получить займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1200 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Muzafar is an intelligent and well-read young man.  He is 21 years old and a second year student at the National University of Tajikistan.  His parents always dreamed that their son would one day go to the university and get a higher education.  Entering the university fulfilled half of his parents' dream.  Now he is trying to fulfill the other half of their dream, and his as well, by learning a lot and graduating successfully.  

Muzafar has applied to IMON International for a loan of $1,200 (USD) to pay his tuition.  He is relying on your kindness and charity.

loans.use: to pay his tuition

loans.name: Zhabarbubu

texts.ru: Жабарбубу 51 год, замужем, мать троих детей. У Жабарбубу среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, вместе с супругом занимаются полеводством и животноводством, стартовав более 30 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду, Жабарбубу на сегодняшний день имеет 2 коровы, 1 лошадь, также есть земельная доля мерою 1,80 ГА, где она выращивает арбузы, кукурузу и хлопок. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жабарбубу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы. Доходы от кредита Жабарбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса и постройку большого сарая для скота.
texts.en:
Zhabarbubu is 51 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  She has a secondary level education.  Her family's main income is from her and her husband's farming and animal husbandry business that she started 30 years ago.  As a result of her hard work, today Zhabarbubu has two cows, a horse, and 1.80 ha of land where she grows watermelons, corn, and cotton.

With the goal of further developing her business, Zhabarbubu applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow.   Zhabarbubu plans to invest the profits from the loan in continued development of her business and in building a large barn for her cattle.

loans.use: to purchase one cow in order to increase headcount of livestock

loans.name: Chantha's Group

texts.en:
A resident of Kampong Cham province, Chantha is a 46 years old mother of six children. Nowadays, she needs to support five of her children; one who is in the university and the other four who are in school. 

For her living, she grows rice as her main source of income. This is her second loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loan completely. 

She leads a group of two members to get this new loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy rice seeds and pay for plowing fee to support her rice farm. She hopes she can expand her farm and provide better for her family.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and pay for plowing fee to support of her rice farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Ray's Group

texts.en:
A villager of Kampong Cham province, Ray is 43 years old and a mother of three children; two of whom are in school. Nowadays, she earns income to support her living via cassava planting and rice cropping. 

For Chantha, this is her second loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loan successfully. She is the leader of a group of two members and she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer to support her cassava farm. She hopes that she can gain a good yield.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer to support her cassava farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Vanndy's Group

texts.en:
Vanndy, 25 years old, is a farmer who lives in Kampong Cham province, and a mother of a schoolchild. 

To support her family, she grows rice and cassava on 1.5 hectare area farmland as her main source of income. In addition, she also works for others for a fee to earn extra income. She has been in this business for seven years and earns about 28,700 KHR per day. She has fully repaid her past loan successfully.

She leads a group of three to get this new loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy seeds and fertilizer to support her farmland. She hopes that she can gain a good yield and expand her cassava farm.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to support her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Poch's Group

texts.en:
Poch, a mother of three children, is 49 years old and a villager of Kampong Cham province. 

For her living, she grows rice on one hectare area farmland as her main source of income. Moreover, she works as a construction worker to supplement her income. She can earn about 41,700 KHR per day to support her family.

This is her first cycle loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is the leader of a group of three and she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seeds. She hopes that she can earn more income to expand her rice farm bigger than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seeds

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Soeung's Group

texts.en:
Living in Kampong Cham province, Soeung is 60 years old and a mother of eight children. 

To overcome her family’s hardship, she grows cassava and works for others for a fee to earn extra income. She has been working in her business for forty years and it has earned her 28,600 KHR per day. 

This is the first loan for Soeung with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of four to get this new loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer to support her farmland. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than last year.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer to support her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Symouy

texts.en:
A local farmer living in Kandal province, Symouy is a mother of four dependent children; one of whom is studying in a university and the other three are still in school. 

To support her living, she earns income via rice cropping and working for others for a fee to earn more. For Symouy, this is her fifth loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans completely. 

She will take her loan portion to buy fertilizer, seeds, and pay for plowing fee to support her rice farm. She hopes that she can earn more money to increase her income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds, and pay for plowing fee to support her rice farm

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru:
Она Шахло. Ей 42 года. Она уроженка района Файзабад. Шахло замужем и имеет двоих детей. Ее муж находиться на заработках в Российской Федерации. Старшему сыну 22 года, он студент высшего учебного заведения. Дочери 24 года она унаследовала ремесло мамы. Шахло 15 лет своей жизни посвятила шитью национальной женской одежды. Она любит свою работу и старается с каждым разом усовершенствоваться. 
   Недавно у Шахло возникли проблемы, по которым она не может выполнять свою работу как прежде. Ее швейная машинка устарела и не может выполнять работу как ранее. Она просит кредит, чтобы купить новую швейную машинку. Поддержите ее!
texts.en:
This is Shahlo.  She is 42 years old and a native of the Faizabad region.  She is married and has two children.  Her husband moved to the Russian Federation to find work.  Shahlo's eldest son is 22 years old.  He is a student in an institute of higher education.  Shahlo's daughter is 24 years old and went into the same line of work as her mother.  Shahlo has devoted the last 15 years of her life to sewing traditional women's clothing.  She loves her work and tries for perfection with every piece she makes.  

Recently, Shahlo encountered some problems that prevent her from doing her job like before.  Her sewing machine has gotten old and it doesn't work as well as it used to.  Shahlo is requesting a loan to buy a new sewing machine.  Please help her!

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase mechanized farming equipment

loans.name: Rahima

texts.ru: Рахима, 61 год, замужем, мать 6 детей. У Рахимы- среднее образование, она на пенсии, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, также печет и продает тандырные самсы. Благодаря упорному труду Рахимы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 корова, а также земельный надел мерою 1,56 ГА, где она выращивает экологически чистый хлопок с дальнейшей реализацией оптовым покупателям. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 25,000 сом (KGS). Накопленные средства Рахима старается вкладывать в развитие и расширение бизнеса. Рахима обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сомов (KGS) на покупку одной коровы. Рахима планирует увеличить доходы от бизнеса и направить прибыль на постройку большого сарая для скота.
texts.en:
Rahima is 61 years old, married, and the mother of six children.  Rahima has a secondary level education and is retired.  Her family's primary income is from Rahima's farming and animal husbandry business.  She also makes and sells tandoori samosas.  As a result of her hard work, today Rahima has a cow and 1.56 ha of land where she grows ecologically friendly cotton, which she sells to wholesalers.  Her monthly income is about 25,000 som (KGS).  Rahima tries to reinvest her profits into expanding and developing her business.

Rahima applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow.  She is planning to increase her income and to direct the profits towards building a large barn for her cattle.

loans.use: to purchase one cow

loans.name: Lea Elizabeth

texts.es:
Lea de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casada  desde hace 18 años  su pareja emigro a los Estados Unidos hace  unos 6 años. Tuvieron en común 3 hijos los cuales  solo dos viven con ella. 


Lea se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar y también a la agricultura pues sea dedicado a esta terea desde que era muy joven sus padres le enseñaron la actividad, ya que ellos eran personas que se dedicaban  a  la agricultura y cuando se casó su pareja también se dedicaba a la agricultura y juntos desempeñan esta labor.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar cemento, bloque, hierro, lamina, para reparar su casa que está en mal estado. El préstamo le ayudara  a tener un lugar más seguro para vivir.

Sueña con tener su propio negocio y tener una fuente de ingresos más segura para así seguir apoyando a su familia,  para  sus hijos los sueños son que sean personas de bien luchadoras igual que ella, que estudien.
texts.en:
Lea is 37 years old. She studied through the sixth grade. She has been married for eighteen years and her husband immigrated to the United States about six years ago. They had three children together and two of them are living with her.

Lea works doing the household chores and also in agriculture as she has been doing this work since she was very young. Her parents taught her the business as they were people dedicated to agriculture and when they married as a couple they worked together farming.

She is asking for a loan to buy cement, blocks, iron, and laminate to repair her home which is in bad condition. The loan will help her have a more secure place to live.

She dreams of having her own business and having a more secure source of income in order to continue supporting her family, and she hopes that her children become good strugglers like her and that they keep studying.

loans.use: to buy cement, blocks, iron, and laminate to repair her home since it is in bad condition. The loan will help her have a more secure place to live.

loans.name: Flor Belkixs

texts.es:
Flor, es una persona emprendedora que administra un negocio de venta de pollos de engorde y pan dulce, forma parte de una familia integrada por su esposo y dos hijos menores de edad; su familia le colabora en realizar algunas actividades relacionadas con el negocio, el oficio lo aprendió siendo empleada, ya con la experiencia adquirida fundo su propio negocio.
Comprará pollos de engorde, insumos para elaborar pan dulce y realizara algunas reparaciones al horno, fortalecerá sus actividades económicas con el fin de ir mejorando la productividad, mantener a sus clientes satisfechos y sobresalir en el mercado.
Aspira seguir ampliando su negocio y cancelar sus deudas para trabajar con capital propio.
texts.en:
Flor is an entrepreneur who has a business selling chickens that have been fattened and pastries. Her family consists of her husband and two young children. They help her to do some of the activities related to the business. She learned the business as an employee and used the experience she gained to open her own business.

She will buy chickens to fatten, supplies to make her pastries, and will make some repairs to the oven. She will strengthen her financial activities with the idea of improving productivity, keeping her customers happy and succeeding in the marketplace.

She hopes to continue expanding her business and to eliminate debt in order to work with her own capital.

loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten, supplies to create pastries, make repairs to her oven, and to strengthen her financial activities

loans.name: Luís Alonso

texts.es:
Luis de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, actualmente se dedica a la agricultura, esta acompañado y padre de 3 hijos los cuales estan estudiado, el primero noveno grado, el segundo sexto grado y el menor cuarto grado, su compañera de vida se dedica a la venta de tamales en la misma comunidad en la que residen.

Luís desde que saco su bachillerato se ha dedicado al cultivo de maíz y ajonjolí, sus hijos de igual manera practican el trabajo que realiza su padre, cuando tiene tiempo libre sus hijos le van a ayudar a sus padres  trabajar en el campo. Tiene que caminar mucho, ya que el lugar donde cultivan queda bien retirado de su hogar.

Con el préstamo pretende comprar lo necesario para la siembra como abono, veneno para la plaga. Para que su cultivo de maíz sea de provecho.

El sueño de Luis es obtener una ganancia de su cultivo, para poder ayudar a sus hijos en el estudio y puedan seguir estudiando
texts.en:
Luis is 35 years old and completed his secondary school studies. Today he works in agriculture. He is married and the father of three children who are studying. The first is in Grade 9, the second is in Grade 6 and the youngest is in Grade 4. His life companion works selling tamales in the community in which they live.

Luis since he graduated has been growing corn and sesame. His children do the same work as their father. When they have free time they go to help their father work in the fields. He has to walk a long ways as the place where he grows is far from his residence.

He plans to buy what is needed to plant like manure and pesticide so that his corn crop will be successful. Luis' dream is to reap a profit from his crops to be able to support his children with their studies so that they can continue to study.

loans.use: to buy manure and pesticide for his corn crop.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
Felipe, considera que los créditos le ayudan de manera inmediata para mejorar la productividad de su negocio, esto lo motiva a solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar 9 qq de abono e insecticidas, para ayudar a que el cultivo de maíz tenga un buen desarrollo.
Con financiamiento anterior su cosecha fue abundante, generando así más ganancias que ha invertido en el pago de cuotas y en dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Felipe thinks that the loans help him immediately to improve the production of his business. This motivates him to request a new loan to buy 9 quintals of manure and insecticides to help his crops develop well. With the previous loan his harvest was abundant, generating more profits which he used to pay his loan installments and provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy manure and insecticides for his corn crops.

loans.name: Sith's Group

texts.en: Living in a rural area in Battambang province, Sith is 61 years old and a married mother with seven dependent children, one of whom is in school. She earns income to improve her family condition via pig-raising and planting rice to earn more income. For Sith, this is her fifth cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid back her past loans wisely to improve her living condition at a gradually pace. She leads a group of three to get a new loan. As the group leader, she will take her loan portion to buy more piglets. She hopes that she can earn more income from her pig-raising and that she can expand this business bigger than before.

loans.use: to buy more piglets.

loans.name: Ranny's Group

texts.en: Ranny, 51, is a mother of three children living in Pursat province. For her living, she grows rice as her single source of income to secure the basic needs in her household. She earns about 35,000 KHR per day. For Ranny, this is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). In a group of two members, she is the group leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy rice seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to support her rice farm. She hopes that she can update her lifestyle better than before.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to support her rice farm.

loans.name: Oy

texts.en: A resident living in Kampong Cham province, Oy is 51 years old and a mother of two children, one of whom is very young. To support her living condition, she earns income via growing cassava and working for others for a fee to earn more income. She has been involved in the business for ages and earns about 40,000 KHR per day. This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer to support her cassava farm. She hopes that she can gain a good yield.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to support her cassava farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Sophean's Group

texts.en: An old woman living in Battambang province, Sophean is 62 years old and a mother of five children. Now, she still needs to support two of her children. To support the struggles of her family, she earns income via pig-raising and working for others for a fee to earn more income. She earns about 36,000 KHR per day. This is her ninth cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loans, which she has fully repaid back, have uplifted her lifestyle gradually. She leads a group of two members to get a new loan. As a group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy more pigs and pig feeds. She hopes that she can improve her family condition better than before and can keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and pig feeds.

loans.name: Choeurn's Group

texts.en: Living in a rural area in Battambang province, Choeurn is 51 years old and a mother of one child. To support her family condition, she cultivates paddy rice as the main source of income and works for others for a fee to supplement her income. For Choeurn, this is her fifth cycles with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans completely. In a group of three, she is the group leader. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and pay a plowing fee. She hopes that she can get a good yield.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay a plowing fee.

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en: A villager in Kampong Cham province, Mom is 64 years old. She is a mother of eight children, one of whom is very young. Nowadays, she earns income to support her family via rice cropping and working as a construction worker to supplement her income. For Mom, this is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of two to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend her loan to buy fertilizer and pay for plowing a field. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and and pay for plowing a field.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Sreymom's Group

texts.en: Sreymom, 42, is a mother of five schoolchildren living in Kampong Cham province. She struggles for a living via pig-raising and working as a construction worker to earn more income to support her family. She leads a group of four to get a new loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is the leader. She will spend her loan portion to buy pig feeds and piglets. She hopes that she can earn more income to expand her pig-raising and her family.

loans.use: to buy pig feeds and piglets.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis es una persona muy trabajadora, recientemente se ha convertido en padre de familia, su hijo se ha convertido en el motor de su vida, por él es que lucha diariamente para poder mejorar su calidad de vida y brindarle un futuro mejor. Desde hace varios años trabaja como obrero de campo en los distintos fundos de su ciudad y cree que le está yendo bien por su dedicación al trabajo.
Luis está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprar cosas para su hijo como ropita, una cuna, entre otros, de esta manera evitará que su hijo se enferme. De esta manera estará más tranquilo y seguirá esforzándose para más adelante poder comprarse un lote de terreno y pueda construir su casa propia.
texts.en:
Luis is a hard-working person who has recently become the father of a family. His son has converted into the driving force of his life. So he struggles daily to be able to improve his quality of living and provide him with a better future. For the past number of years he has been working as a farm worker on the various farms in his city and he feels that things are going well because of his dedication at work.

Luis is grateful to the lenders at Kiva as thanks to their support he can buy things for his son like clothing, a crib, amongst others. Doing this he can ensure that his son won't get sick. In this way he will feel more at ease and secure to continue making the effort to be able to buy a piece of land in the future to construct his own house.

loans.use: to buy clothing and a crib for his new born baby.

loans.name: Sora's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of the Bakan district, Sora is aged 39 years and married with four children. The main source of the family’s income is from rice farming which she has been doing for 21 years to make a living. To add additional income, she also works as a teacher in the local area. 

Sora has been with VisionFund for three cycles and now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Sora wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to make more income so as to make living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland.

loans.name: Sophy's Group

texts.en:
Aged 37 years old, Sophy is a married mother of three children living in a rural village of the Sithor Kandal district of Prey Veng province. Rice farming and selling pork meat are the main sources of the family’s income. She has been in this business for 18 years, earning about 35,000 KHR per day.
  
Sophy’s group consists of five members who are all female living in the same village. She is in her first cycle with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. Sophy, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice healthfully and sell it for a good price to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Samai's Group

texts.en:
A rural villager from the Dambae district, Samai is 35 years old and married. She has three children. She has been growing cassava. Having been in this business for almost 18 years, she currently can earn about 34,000 KHR per day.
 
This is the microloan for Samai’s group. She is in her third cycle with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to seek a loan. Samai wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her family’s income to make living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: José Efraín

texts.es:
José de 33 años de edad, es un agricultor de granos básicos, está  acompañado su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, son padres de tres hijos de ellos dos están en la escuela, ya que José estudio hasta bachillerato y se quedó trabajando en la agricultura; porque le gusto cultivar hoy tiene una familia formada de tres hijos y su esposa. 

El negocio de José es cultivar, tiene 15 años de cultivar maíz y frijol son sus dos variedades de granos, aprendió este trabajo porque su papá por mucho tiempo a sembrado lo mismo, además por tardes realiza una actividad más como corralero de un establo de seis vacas, tanto el trabajo en la agricultura como el establo le quedan a dos cuadras de su casa, algo que le favorece; es así que termina trabajando todo el día solo descansa unas dos horas mientras comen sus alimentos.

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar fertilizantes para  14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y 3,500 de frijol; así como también para limpiar la milpa y otros que van en acción del mismo cultivo.

El deseo de José en el futuro es que con las ganancias obtenidas del trabajo realizado comprar terreno donde trabajar en lo propio para que su familia este más protegida en cuanto tenga donde vivir más allá y querer al menos uno de sus hijos estudie una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
José is 33 years old. He is a farmer of basic grains. His wife does the domestic chores. They are parents of three children with two of them in school. José studied until high school and stayed working in agriculture because he likes to farm and today he has a family made up of his three children and his wife.

Jose has a business in agriculture. He has been growing corn and beans for fifteen years and they are his two varieties of grain. He learned this work because his father planted the same crops for a long time. Also in the afternoons he takes care of livestock in a stable of six cows. Both the farming and stable are two blocks from his home, which makes it easier for him. After working all day alone he rests a couple of hours while eating his dinner.

He is asking for a loan through CrediCampo in order to buy fertilizer for 14,000 square meters of corn and 3,500 of beans, as well as to also clean the corn and other items going into growing the crop.

In the future José wants to use his earnings to buy his own land to work so that his family is more secure even if he has to live further away and he wants at least one of his children to study for a university degree.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for 14,000 square meters of corn and 3,500 of beans, and also to clean the corn and other items that go into growing the crop

loans.name: Megilikhol

texts.ru:
Мегилихол жительница Хуросонского района Республики Таджикистан. Она очень добрая, вежливая и гостеприимная женщина. Ей 61 год. Мегилихол потеряла своего мужа и является вдовой, но гордо носит статус мамы, свекрови и бабушки. Ее сын находиться на заработках заграницей. Мегилихол с невесткой и внуками живут в одном доме. Невестка портниха, она берет заказы на шитье одежды на дому. Сама Мегилихол занимается купле продажей крупно рогатых скотов. Животноводческую деятельность она начала 10 лет назад. Она покупает маленьких телят и после длительного откорма перепродает на скотном рынке, таким не хитрым способом она зарабатывает на жизнь.
   На данный момент Мегилихолу необходимо отремонтировать дом до прохода зимы. Она заботиться о здоровье маленьких внуков и надеется, что ей помогут в скором времени сделать ремонт. Поддержите ее. Она обещает выплачивать кредит в сроки.
texts.en:
Megilikhol lives in the Khuroson region of the Republic of Tajikistan.  She is a very kind, polite, and hospitable woman.  Megilikhol is 61 years old and, having lost her husband, a widow, but she is proud to be a mother, mother-in-law, and grandmother.  Her son moved abroad to find work.  Megilikol lives in the same house with her daughter-in-law and grandchildren.  Her daughter-in-law is a seamstress who works from home making tailored clothes.  Megilikhol has a cattle business, which she started 10 years ago.  She buys young calves and, after a lengthy process of raising and fattening them, she sells them at the cattle market.  She earns her living in this clever manner.

Currently, Megilikhol desperately needs to repair her home before winter.  She's worried about her little grandchildren's health and she hopes that she will soon find help with this.  Please support her.  She promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: to repair her home before winter

loans.name: Nhóm 08 Thôn 3 Thống Nhất -Quảng Vinh Group

texts.en:
Lý is 56 years old. She is married and has one child.

Lý is the leader of the Nhóm 08 Thôn 3 Thống Nhất -Quảng Vinh solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

Lý  works in agriculture, raising poultry and pigs. Lý  has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Lý  faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

This is Lý's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Lý hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her child to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

loans.name: Pedro Francisco

texts.es:
Pedro, cuenta con mayor demanda de sus servicios en la imprenta, necesita capital para comprar algunos repuestos para el equipo de trabajo y papelería, así podrá continuar dando un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
El financiamiento anterior ha sido bien administrado por don Pedro, pues actualmente no ha dejado de trabajar, tiene recursos económicos para subsistir junto  a su familia y ha cancelado con buen record la deuda adquirida.
texts.en:
With higher demand for his printing services, Pedro needs capital to buy supplies for his work and stationary shop in order to continue providing better service to his customers.

Pedro managed his previous loan very well. He has not stopped working, has the money to support his family and has paid off his debt.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his work and stationary shop in order to continue providing better service to his customers.

loans.name: Asel

texts.ru: Асель 38 лет, разведена, мать 2 детей. У нее средне-специальное образование, с 2002 года занимается животноводством и полеводством. Все дети активно помогают матери. В хозяйстве Асель на сегодняшний день есть: 1 корова, 1 лошадь, куры и кролики, а также на собственном земельном наделе мерою 0,50 ГА и арендованном - мерою 0,50 ГА, она выращивает картофель. Также Асель перепродает ячмень. Ежемесячный доход составляет 18,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Асель обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку лошади, часть средств будет потрачена на покупку ячменя для перепродажи. Доходы от бизнеса помогут улучшить благосостояние Асель и ее семьи.
texts.en:
Asel is 38 years old, divorced, and the mother of two children.   She has a specialized secondary level education.  Since 2002 she has been in the farming and animal husbandry business.  Both her children take an active part in helping her.  Currently she has a cow, a horse, as well as chickens and rabbits.  She also owns 0.50 ha of land and rents another 0.50 ha where she grows potatoes.  Besides this, she also trades in barley.  Her monthly income amounts to 18,000 som (KGS).

With the goal of further developing her business, Asel applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy a horse and barley.  She will resell the barley.   The profits from the loan will help to improve Asel's and her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase one horse and barley for resale

loans.name: Digma Arely

texts.es:
Digma tiene 22 años de edad, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a la agricultura, ella estudio hasta séptimo grado esta acompañada y tiene dos hijos los cuales solamente uno esta estudiado segundo grado. Su compañero de vida trabaja en la agricultura.

Digma junto a su compañero de vida se dedica a cultivar la tierra, en la siembra de maíz y pipían ya que ella después de los quehaceres del hogar se va a ayudarle a sus compañero de vida al trabajo en el campo.

Con el préstamo pretende sembrar ¾ de hectárea de maíz, en lo que invertirá es la preparación de la tierra y comprar abono y semilla.

El sueño de Digma es poder obtener ganancias del cultivo y así poder sacar a sus hijos adelante.
texts.en:
Digma is 22 years old. She looks after the household chores and works in farming. She has a seventh grade education. Digma has a partner and two children, one of whom is in second grade. Digma's life partner works in farming.

Digma makes a living working the land alongside her partner, growing corn and chilis. After taking care of the household chores, Digma goes to help her partner with the work in the field. 

This loan will be used to sow corn on three quarters of a hectare of land. It will be invested in preparing the land and buying manure and seeds.

Digma's dream is to earn profits from her crops and to be able to help her children to get ahead.

loans.use: to prepare the earth and to buy manure and seeds to plant corn on three quarters of a hectare of land.

loans.name: Yoeun's Group

texts.en:
Yoeun lives in the Bakan district of Pursat province. He is age 48 years and married and he has four children. 

To support the family, he farms rice and catches fish. Having been in this business for 30 years, he can earn about 33,000 KHR per day. 

He is a third-cycle client with VisionFund. The past loans have helped him better support his family. Now he is leading his group of two others to apply for a new loan. As the group leader, he will use his portion to buy cast net for supporting his fishing business. He hopes to catch more fish so as to sell them for a good price.

loans.use: to buy a cast net for supporting her fishing business.

loans.name: José Renato

texts.es:
José de 62 años de edad, es agricultor, estudio hasta noveno grado. Su compañera de vida se dedica a vender ropa, tiene un hijo el cual se encuentra estudiado primer grado.

A José le gusta mucho la agricultura y sea dedicado a ese trabajo desde joven, él siembra maíz y pipían, cuando su compañera de vida tiene tiempo le ayuda a José a cultivar y a realizar el trabajo de campo.

Con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos necesarios para los cultivos que ya tiene sembrado de pipían y de maíz, comprara 4 sacos de abono, y veneno para la plaga.

Su sueño es que sus cultivos puedan obtener ganancias, para sostener a su familia y que su querido hijo pueda seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
José is 62 years old. He is a farmer and has a ninth grade education. His partner makes a living selling clothes. The couple has one son who is in first grade.

José really like working in farming and has been doing this work since he was young. He grows corn and chilis. When his partner has the time she helps José to grow the crops and works in the field.

This loan will be used to buy the necessary supplies for his crops, chili and corn. He will buy four bags of manure and anti-disease chemicals.

José's dream is for his crops to earn him a profit in order to support his family and so that his much-loved son can continue with his education.

loans.use: to buy four bags of manure and anti-disease treatments for his chili and corn crops.

loans.name: Tok's Group

texts.en:
Tok, 65, is a local farmer living in Pursat province, and she is a mother of five children. 

She earns income to support her family via rice cropping on three hectares. She can earn income of about 24,700 KHR per day.
 
Tok is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As a group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seed and pesticide to support her farmland. She hopes to timely grow her rice so as to sell it for a good price.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, rice seed and pesticide to support her farmland.

loans.name: Sokneang's Group

texts.en:
A mother of three children living in Sithor Kandal district, Prey Veng province, Sokneang is 49 years old. 

For a living, she grows rice and weaves cotton to earn more income. She has been involved in this business for 29 years. The current businesses earn her about 44,000 KHR per day to offset her daily expenses.
 
Sokneang’s group consists of two members who live in the same village, and she is in her first cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is now leading her group to ask for a loan. As a group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy rice seed for her farmland and pay for plowing. She hopes to timely grow her rice so as to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice seed for her farmland.

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Sreyoun's Group

texts.en:
A farmer from Kampong Cham province, Sreyoun is 27 years old and a mother of two children. One is in school and another one is too young for school.

To support her living, she has been cropping rice and supplementing the income by working for others for a fee. She can earn about 31,500 KHR per day.

This is the second cycle for Sreyoun with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she fully repaid her past loan. 

Her group has two members, and she is a group leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer to support her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to support her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Maria Dora

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para comprar variedad de ropa e insumos agrícolas para la milpa, fortalecerá sus actividades económicas para satisfacer a sus clientes y continuar teniendo ingresos para cumplir con sus obligaciones.
El capital anterior ha sido de ayuda para María, ya que ha tenido recursos económicos para mejorar su negocio de venta de ropa y la granja, con la buena administración ha logrado cambiar positivamente las condiciones de vida familiar y cancelar su deuda.
texts.en:
María is requesting a new loan in order to purchase a variety of clothing, and agricultural supplies for her cornfield.  She will strengthen her business activities in order to satisfy her customers and continue having income in order to fulfill her obligations.

The previous capital has been helpful to María because she has had the economic resources to improve her clothing sales and farming businesses.  By managing them well, she has been able to make positive changes in her family’s living conditions, and pay off her debt.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing, and agricultural supplies for the cornfield, and to strengthen her business activities.

loans.name: Dorn's Group

texts.en:
Residing in Kampong Cham province, Dorn is 59 years old and a mother of eight children. 

She makes a living through growing cassava and working for others for a fee. The current business earns her about 30,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
This is her third cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she fully repaid her past loans. She is now leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to grow her cassava so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Sinoun's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area in Kampong Cham province, Sinoun is 35 years old and a mother of four children. 

To make a living, she has been growing cassava and rice in the local area. She earns about 30,100 KHR per day to support her family’s needs.

This is her first loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is now leading a group of two to get new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes that she can get a good yield from her rice paddy.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Lina's Group

texts.en:
A mother of a young child from Kampong Cham province, Lina is 20 years old. 

To make a living, she grows cassava as her main source of income. To supplement the income, she has been working as a paid worker. She has been involved in this business for two years and she can earn about 31,500 KHR per day.

This is first time for Lina with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Now she is leading a group of two members and she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer to support her farmland. She hopes that she can gain a good yield from her cassava plantation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to support her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an air pump and polishing machine.

loans.name: Kulshat

texts.ru: Кулшат 51 год, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Кулшат работает в школе уборщицей, также в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, начав свой бизнес с 1999 года. Благодаря упорному труду Кулшат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 1 корова, 25 овец, 1 лошадь. Бизнес Кулшат в месяц приносит около 4,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки овец. Доходы от кредита Кулшат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Kulshat is 51 years old, married, and has three children.  She works as a school janitor, but her family's main income is from her cattle business, which she started in 1999.  As a result of her tireless work, today Kulshat has a cow, 25 sheep, and a horse.  Kulshat's business brings in about 4,000 som (KGS) per month.

With an aim to further developing her business, Kulshat applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy additional sheep.  Kulshat plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of her cattle.

loans.use: to purchase additional sheep

loans.name: Yang

texts.en:
Yang, 63, is a mother of seven children living in Kandal province. 

To make a living, she grows rice as her single source of income to support her family. She has been involved in this business for 33 years and earns about 42,000 KHR per day.

This is her second cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she fully repaid her past loan. She is now asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and seed to support her farmland. She hopes that she can gain a good yield and sell at a high price so she can get more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed to support her farmland.

loans.name: Horn's Group

texts.en:
A local resident living in Kampong Cham province, Horn is 45 years old and a mother of seven children. 

She struggles for a living through farming rice and working for others for a fee. Having been in this business for 25 years, she is able to earn about 42,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
This is the first loan for Horn with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Now she is leading her group and as the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for storing his food.

loans.name: Nhóm 03 - Thôn 1- Đông Bắc - Quảng Vinh Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Ngoan works in agriculture raising poultry . She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry  to raise and sell in future.

Ngoan is 43 years old and she is married with one child. Ngoan is the group leader of the Nhóm 03 - Thôn 1- Đông Bắc - Quảng Vinh solidarity group, which consists of four members.
